Table oms.Shop2DeliveryOptionDefDO

Delivery option naming as used by a shop instead of defaults.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
DeliveryOptionDefDO deliveryOptionDefRef integer NOT_NULL The delivery option that should have a shop-specific naming. 
shopDeliveryOptionName varchar(50) The name of the delivery option as used by the shop instead of defaults. Example "Overnight" 
ShopDO shopRef bigint NOT_NULL The shop the name of the delivery option should be used for. 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.
